column2: Blackrock cut stake in Italy's Banco Popolare to 4.9 pct-filing MILAN
column3: Nov 28 U.S. investment firm Blackrock  has lowered its stake in Italian cooperative bank Banco Popolare
column4: according to a regulatory filing on Friday which showed a holding of 4.91 percent as of Nov. 21.

column2: Kinder Morgan loses bid to extend injunction against Canada protesters VANCOUVER
column3: Nov 27 Kinder Morgan Energy Partners LP said on Thursday that it would clear its equipment and crews off a mountain in the Vancouver suburb of Burnaby by month-end
column4: after it lost a bid to extend an injunction keeping protesters away from the site.

column2: Medtronic wins conditional EU approval for $43 bln Covidien buyMedtronic wins conditional EU approval for $43 billion Covidien buy BRUSSELS U.S. medical device maker Medtronic  gained European Union regulatory approval on Friday for its $43 billion takeover of Covidien Plc  after agreeing to sell its Irish rival's drug-coated balloon catheter business.
